colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI NGOS RANG LA DANG 'DUN CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS DGOS TSUL BZHIN DU, ^GUNG THANG RIN PO CHE'I 'JIGS BYED DPA' GCIG GI BSKYED RIM LA, RJE BTZONG KHA PA SOGS KYI GSUNG RE GNYIS KYIS BRGYAN PA LAS, GZHAN PA LA CHED DE KHA SOR BZHAG ,GZU LUM, RANG BZO SOGS KYIS MA BSLANG BAR ^MA TI BHADRA TZINHDA SIDDHA 'AM MING GZHAN DON GRUB RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI ZUR GNAS DPYOD LDAN RAB 'BYAMS PA MGON PO SKYABS SO, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
